title: Rescue Remedy® Dropper
description: Stay on top of your busy day with our RESCUE REMEDY drops. Using a blend of five Bach Original Flower Remedies, our rescue drops help provide stress relief to millions around the world.
cleaned_text: Rescue Remedy® Dropper Natural Stress Relief* Trusted Worldwide For Generations Doctor developed Rescue Remedy® drops provide gentle, non-habit forming relief from everyday stress.* Convenient and discreet, Rescue Remedy® is a daily essential for those moments when you are juggling work deadlines, soccer practice and the hustle and bustle of everyday life. - Gentle & non-habit forming - Natural active ingredients - Approximately 190 doses per bottle: 0.70 fl oz (20mL) - Approximately 90 doses per bottle: 0.35 fl oz (10mL) [FSA or HSA eligible](/en-us/explore/faqs/are-rescue-products-fsa-or-hsa-eligible/) PACKAGING VARY in: 0.7 fl oz (20mL) 0.35 fl oz (10mL) 1 Nelson Bach USA Ltd is a participant in the Amazon Services LLC Associates Program, an affiliate advertising program designed to provide a means to earn from qualifying purchases. Scroll down for Rescue Remedy® Dropper drug facts, FAQs, articles, & more A doctor-developed blend of 5 Bach® flowers, grape spirits, water, & that's it! The Rescue Remedy® formula is the same today as when it was first developed by Dr. Edward Bach 85+ years ago. Cherry Plum Be In Control Clematis Have Focus Impatiens Have Patience Rock Rose Have Courage Star of Bethlehem Neutralize Grief Developed By A Doctor Developed by a doctor more than 80 years ago, homeopathic Rescue Remedy® was formulated to help you stress less, stay calm and in control.* A blend of five Bach® Original Flower Remedies, the original Rescue Remedy® in the iconic little yellow bottle has provided gentle, non-habit forming stress relief to millions around the world for generations. Blend Of 5 Flower Remedies Dr. Bach developed his original blend of flower remedies — Rock Rose, Impatiens, Clematis, Star of Bethlehem, and Cherry Plum — to help you regain control when life leaves you a little frazzled.* Manufactured with only the highest quality ingredients, all five flower remedies found in Bach® Rescue Remedy® are still produced at Dr. Bach's original gardens and carry his personal signature. Gentle & Safe For The Family Everyone experiences stress from time to time; support your wellbeing and harness the positive potential of Rescue Remedy® by simply adding 4 drops to a drink of your choice or put 4 drops on your tongue as often as required. Available in a 10mL or 20mL dropper bottle, Rescue Remedy® is gentle, safe and suitable for use by the entire family.
